any additional information: Used both activated carbons A and B, experiments repeated five times

decolorization result: sorption capacity of AC-A is 4.24*10-3 g/g
any additional information: AC-B has sorption capacity of 6.1*10-3 g/g
BAS-A showed increased sorption capacity, BAS-B showed reduced sorption capacity compared to the reference
Sorption capacity of BAS-B decreased significantly, by more than five times
During the biosorption process, AC-A was regenerated by film of microorganisms
